item.title: Switching JaxRS serializer in payara
item.description: When working with Payara I stumble every once in a while over JSON-serialization issues. Payara v4 uses MOXy as default provider while Payara v5 comes with JsonB-support which apparently makes use of Yasson. Although, after moving from v4 to v5 I’m fine with the JsonB-default it may still be useful to use Jackson as JSON provider instead of the default one (to be honest, many things just worked out-of-the-box with Jackson like reflective access to props (no extra getter necessary) or support for Maps etc.
